questions.Example: 哥哥带我去看电影
questions.PinyinExample: gē gē dài wǒ qù kàn diàn yǐng
questions.exampleTranslated: My elder brother is bringing me to watch a movie

questions.Example: 我喜欢和爸爸一起去钓鱼
questions.PinyinExample: wǒ xǐ huān hé bà bà yī qǐ qù diào yú
questions.exampleTranslated: I like to go fishing with my father

questions.Example: 我星期六要去游泳
questions.PinyinExample: wǒ xīng qī liù yào qù yóu yǒng
questions.exampleTranslated: I am going swimming on Saturday

questions.Example: 我喜欢晚上跑步
questions.PinyinExample: wǒ xǐ huān wǎn shàng pǎo bù
questions.exampleTranslated: I like to go jogging at night

questions.question: How do you say Watching Movies in Chinese?
questions.explanation: 看电影 means watching movies

questions.question: What does “钓鱼” refer to?
questions.explanation: 钓鱼 means fishing

questions.question: What does “跑步” refer to?
questions.explanation: 跑步 means jogging

questions.question: Translate: “表哥问我 “你好吗””
options: My cousin asked me “How are you?”
My cousin asked me “Have you eaten?”
My cousin asked me “What time is it?”
My cousin asked me “How is your brother?”
questions.correct_answer: My cousin asked me “How are you?”
questions.explanation: 你好吗 means how are you

questions.question: How would you say “I shook hands with my cousin.” in Chinese?
questions.explanation: 表哥 means cousin

questions.question: How would you say “Uncle used to be an engineer.” in Chinese?
options: 叔叔曾经是一名工程师
questions.correct_answer: 叔叔曾经是一名工程师
questions.explanation: 工程师 means engineer

questions.question: Translate: “奶奶煮了肉骨茶”
questions.explanation: 肉骨茶 means Bak Kut Teh

questions.question: Translate “吃完晚饭后, 我们全家人一起看电影”
options: After dinner, our whole family watched a movie together.
After dinner, our whole family went for a walk.
After dinner, our whole family played mahjong.
After dinner, our whole family played card games.
questions.correct_answer: After dinner, our whole family watched a movie together.
questions.explanation: 看电影 means watch movies

questions.Example: 这款手机有强大的摄像头功能, 可以拍出高清照片.
questions.PinyinExample: zhè kuǎi shǒu jī yǒu qiáng dà de shè xiàng tóu gōng néng, kě yǐ pāi chū gāo qīng zhào piàn.
questions.exampleTranslated: This mobile phone has a powerful camera function that can capture high-definition photos.

questions.Example: 我的电脑用来处理工作和学习任务非常方便.
questions.PinyinExample: wǒ de diàn nǎo yòng lái chǔ lǐ gōng zuò hé xué xí rèn wù fēi cháng fāng biàn.)
questions.exampleTranslated: My computer is very convenient for handling work and study tasks.

questions.Example: 孩子们喜欢使用平板电脑来看动画片和玩游戏.
questions.PinyinExample: hái zi men xǐ huān shǐ yòng píng bǎn diàn nǎo lái kàn dòng huà piàn hé wán yóu xì
questions.exampleTranslated: Children like to use tablets to watch cartoons and play games.

questions.Example: 这款智能手表可以监测心率、计步数, 还支持通知提醒.
questions.PinyinExample: zhè kuǎi zhì néng shǒu biǎo kě yǐ jiān cè xīn lǜ, jì bù shù, hái zhī chí tōng zhī tí xǐng
questions.exampleTranslated: This smartwatch can monitor heart rate, count steps, and also supports notification reminders.

questions.Example: 我戴上耳机, 享受音乐的美妙
questions.PinyinExample: wǒ dài shàng ěr jī, xiǎng shòu yīn yuè de měi wò.
questions.exampleTranslated: I put on headphones to enjoy the beauty of music.

questions.question: 我经常使用_________ 查看地图导航.
questions.explanation: Question says user is using something to check on GPS, hence headphones, and computer are wrong.

questions.question: 这款_________ 具备计步功能
questions.explanation: Logically, only the smart watch would be able to count steps

questions.question: 在_________ 上观看视频很方便
questions.explanation: The only gadget with the biggest screen to enable better viewing would be the tablet.

questions.Example: 我喜欢在夏天去游泳池游泳
questions.PinyinExample: wǒ xǐ huān zài xià tiān qù yóu yǒng chí yóu yǒng
questions.exampleTranslated: I like to go swimming in the swimming pool in summer

questions.Example: 她每周练习瑜伽, 以保持身体的灵活性
questions.PinyinExample: tā měi zhōu liàn xí yú jiā, yǐ bǎo chí shēn tǐ de líng huó xìng
questions.exampleTranslated: She practices yoga every week to keep her body flexible

questions.Example: 她喜欢在公园里跑步, 以保持体形和健康
questions.PinyinExample: tā xǐ huān zài gōng yuán lǐ pǎo bù, yǐ bǎo chí tǐ xíng hé jiàn kāng
questions.exampleTranslated: She enjoys running in the park to stay in shape and healthy

questions.Example: 周末, 我和朋友一起骑脚车, 探索附近的风景
questions.PinyinExample: zhōu mò, wǒ hé péng yǒu yī qǐ qí jiǎo chē, tàn suǒ fù jìn de fēng jǐng
questions.exampleTranslated: On weekends, I ride bicycles with my friends and explore the nearby scenery

questions.Example: 健身可以帮助提高肌肉力量
questions.PinyinExample: jiàn shēn kě yǐ bāng zhù tí gāo jī ròu lì liàng
questions.exampleTranslated: Fitness can help improve muscle strength

questions.question: 她每天都_________ 去上班
questions.explanation: Question is stating how someone goes to work, hence the only logical decison is riding a bicycle

questions.question: 请在_________ 池边保持安全
questions.explanation: 池 means pool, hence the only exercise making sense would be swimming

questions.question: 我们可以一起去_________ 房锻炼身体
questions.explanation: only 健身房 makes sense, which is the gym room.

questions.Example: 许多人选择素食, 因为它有益于健康和环保.
questions.PinyinExample: xǔ duō rén xuǎn zé sù shí, yīn wèi tā yǒu yì yú jiàn kāng hé huán bǎo.
questions.exampleTranslated: Many people choose a vegetarian diet because of its health benefits and environmental benefits.

questions.Example: 许多人遵循减肥饮食, 以减轻体重和塑造身材
questions.PinyinExample: xǔ duō rén zūn xún jiǎn féi yǐn shí, yǐ jiǎn qīng tǐ zhòng hé sù zào shēn cái
questions.exampleTranslated: Many people follow weight loss diets to lose weight and get in shape

questions.pinyin: dī tàn shuǐ huà hé wù yǐn shí
questions.Example: 低碳水化合物饮食对于健康和体重管理非常重要.
questions.PinyinExample: dī tàn shuǐ huà hé wù yǐn shí duì yú jiàn kāng hé tǐ zhòng guǎn lǐ fēi cháng zhòng yào
questions.exampleTranslated: A low-carbohydrate diet is essential for health and weight management.

questions.Example: 糖尿病饮食对于糖尿病患者来说至关重要, 以控制血糖水平.
questions.PinyinExample: táng niào bìng yǐn shí duì yú táng niào bìng huàn zhě lái shuō zhì guān zhòng yào, yǐ kòng zhì xiě táng shuǐ píng.
questions.exampleTranslated: A diabetic diet is essential for diabetics to control blood sugar levels.

questions.Example: 一些人选择高蛋白饮食以增加肌肉质量和饱腹感
questions.PinyinExample: yī xiē rén xuǎn zé gāo dàn bái yǐn shí yǐ zēng jiā jī ròu zhì liàng hé bǎo fù gǎn
questions.exampleTranslated: Some people choose high-protein diets to increase muscle mass and feel fuller

questions.question: 请在_________ 中避免高糖零食
questions.explanation: Question states to avoid high sugar snacks, hence the diet which makes the most sense is diabetic

questions.question: _________ 包括肉类、鱼类和豆类
questions.explanation: Fish, meat and tofu are high in protein, hence the most appropriate one would be high protein diets

questions.question: ________ 包括蔬菜、水果和坚果
questions.explanation: Fruits, vegtables and nuts would fit best in a vegetarian diet.

questions.Example: 我常常去图书馆借书和学习
questions.PinyinExample: wǒ cháng cháng qù tú shū guǎn jiè shū hé xué xí
questions.exampleTranslated: I often go to the library to borrow books and study

questions.Example: 医院是一个提供医疗护理的地方.
questions.PinyinExample: yī yuàn shì yī gè tí gōng yī liáo hù lǐ dì dì fāng.
questions.exampleTranslated: A hospital is a place where medical care is provided.

questions.Example: 社区中心提供各种文化和体育活动
questions.PinyinExample: shè qū zhōng xīn tí gōng gè zhǒng wén huà hé tǐ yù huó dòng
questions.exampleTranslated: Community center offers a variety of cultural and sporting activities

questions.Example: 在周末, 我们常常去购物中心购物和用餐
每周, 我们去市场购买新鲜的水果和蔬菜
questions.PinyinExample: zài zhōu mò, wǒ men cháng cháng qù gòu wù zhòng xīn gòu wù hé yòng cān
questions.exampleTranslated: On weekends, we often go to shopping malls for shopping and dining

questions.question: 我喜欢在_________ 静静地阅读好书.
questions.explanation: The quietest and best place to read a good book would be the library.

questions.question: _______ 提供医疗护理和急救服务
questions.explanation: A place where one can recieve treatment and emergency services would be the hospital

questions.question: _______ 是热闹的食品交易场所
questions.explanation: A lively place to for food or ingridients transactions would be a market

topics.topicName: Topic 5: Things you do at home

questions.Example: 我每天都会在家学习以提高我的知识水平
questions.PinyinExample: wǒ měi tiān dū huì zài jiā xué xí yǐ tí gāo wǒ de zhī shì shuǐ píng
questions.exampleTranslated: I study at home every day to improve my knowledge

questions.Example: 做饭可以尝试新的食谱.
questions.PinyinExample: Zuò fàn kěyǐ chángshì xīn de shípǔ.
questions.exampleTranslated: You can try new recipes when cooking.

questions.Example: 每天晚上, 我都会找时间休息, 恢复精力.
questions.PinyinExample: měi tiān wǎn shàng, wǒ dū huì zhǎo shí jiān xiū xí, huī fù jīng lì.
questions.exampleTranslated: Every night, I find time to rest and recharge.

questions.Example: 我喜欢在晚上听音乐, 放松身心
questions.PinyinExample: wǒ xǐ huān zài wǎn shàng tīng yīn yuè, fàng sōng shēn xīn
questions.exampleTranslated: I like to listen to music in the evening and relax

questions.Example: 我每周六都清洁干净房间
questions.PinyinExample: wǒ měi zhōu liù dōu qīng jié gān jìng fáng jiān
questions.exampleTranslated: I clean the room every Saturday

questions.question: 她经常在图书馆_________ 到深夜
questions.explanation: Out of the 4 options, learning would be the best one in the library till late

questions.question: 请在_________ 时小心使用厨房器具
questions.explanation: As the quesiton mentions about kitchen applicances, the best explanation would be making meals

questions.question: 她经常在晚上_________ 流行歌曲
questions.explanation: For hit music, the highest chance would be for the person to listen to it.

questions.question: 我和朋友一起去做运动.我们聊起了科技, 我向他展示了我刚买的________, 它可以测量心率和步数.
questions.explanation: As the item could track blood pressure and steps, the most logical item would be the smart watch.

questions.question: 我们去蔡厝港的_______房健身.
questions.explanation: Only the gym room to gym makes sense

questions.question: 健身结束后, 我们去了附近的小贩中心.我的朋友建议我在健身后吃________, 以增强肌肉.
questions.explanation: To build muscles, the meal most suitable would be the high protein meal

questions.question: 在小贩中心用餐后, 我们前往_________购买一些日用品和生活必需品
questions.explanation: To purchase groceries and daily necessities, one has to go to the shopping mall to get them.

questions.question: 买好所需物品后, 我们决定回家_________和恢复精力
questions.explanation: After a day, the logical option would be to head home to rest.
